channel.title: Memory on Alic's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Memory on Alic's Blog

item.title: Thinking of Guan Chengjun
item.description: When I got up in the morning, I opened my computer. Inadvertently into Li Danyuan’s QQ space, in his album saw a photo of Guan Chengjun - much more handsome than before, the gods, a manly man! It seems that I haven’t seen him for years, and I don’t know where he is now working in where he is developed, I don’t know anything about him now. As if the only remaining little friendship between classmates is also so difficult to touch.
